segments.text: In this kitchen, everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying dishes by the sink, focused and steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water's running, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's starting to spill over, forming a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool carefully toward the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He dips into the cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's nearby, arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool sways a bit, but he holds on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden path winds neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes wait on the counter, clean and stacked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a typical moment, yet full of small risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice the overflow soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children share a quiet adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
